price: Nítorí náà, ní òní àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo yóò fi àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́ rẹ́rìn-ín.
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
